document.docAuthor: Malagón-Aldana, Leonardo A., Smith, David R., Vilhelmsen, Lars & Serna, Francisco
document.masterDocTitle: The sawflies and woodwasps (Hymenoptera: ‘ Symphyta’) of Colombia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The sawflies and woodwasps (Hymenoptera: ‘ Symphyta’) of Colombia

subSubSection.paragraph:
D. altilis ( Konow, 1906 )
: Brazil, Suriname (Smith 1990), COLOMBIA . Amazonas , Leticia , Matamata, PNN Amacayacu, 150m , 3°41’S , 70°15’W , malaise trap, 08 August 2000 , A. Parente leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149401). Same data, 08 March 2000 , M. Sharkey leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149402).
Vaupés
, Antigua Cabaña, Estación Biológica Mosiro-Itajura (Caparú), 60m , 1°04’N , 69°03’W , malaise trap, 25 February 2003 , J. Pinzón leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E- 149404). Vaupés , Terrazas, Estación Biológica Mosiro-Itajura (Caparú), 60m , 1°04’S , 69°31’W , malaise trap, 06 November 2002 , L. Benavides leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149403).

D. fabulosa ( Benson and Conde, 1938 )
: Brazil (Smith 1990), COLOMBIA .
Vichada
, Bosque Sabana, PNN El Tuparro, 100m , 5°21’N , 67°51’W , malaise trap, 15 June 2000 , M. Sharkey and C. Sarmiento leg., 12 spec. , (IAvH- E-149372 to 149381; IAvH-E-149382 to 149383); W. Villalba leg., 5 spec. , (IAvH-E-149364; IAvH-E-149366 to 149368; IAvH-E-149371). Same data, red pan trap, 16 June 2000 , M. Sharkey leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149384). Same data, 19 June 2000 , W. Villalba leg., 3 spec. , (IAvH-E-149365; IAvH-E-149369; IAvH-E-149370). Same data, 18 August 2000 , W. Villalba leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149363).

D. florida ( Konow, 1906 )
: Peru (Smith 1990), COLOMBIA . Amazonas , Leticia , Matamata, PNN Amacayacu, 150m , 3°41’S , 70°15’W , malaise trap, 02 October 2001 , D. Chota leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149392). Same data, pitfall, 08 March 2000 , M. Sharkey leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149387). Same data, 11 November 2000 , A. Parente leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149391). Same data, 12 March 2001 , D. Chota leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149389). Same data, 29 May 2000 , A. Parente leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149385). Same data, sweep net, 08 March 2000 , D. Campos leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149386). Amazonas, Leticia , San Martín, PNN Amacayacu, 150m , 3°46’S , 70°18’W , malaise trap, 13 December 2000 , B. Amado leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149390). Same data, 16 August 2000 , B. Amado leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149388). Same data, 30April 2000 , B. Amado leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149393).
Putumayo
, Cabaña Chagra, PNN La Paya, 320m , 0°07’S , 74°56’W , malaise trap, 15 November 2001 , R. Cobete leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149400). Putumayo , Loma Alta , PNN La Paya, 350m , 0°06’S , 74°58’W , malaise trap, 15 June 2004 , M. Trejos leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E- 151280 ).
Vaupés
, Antigua Cabaña, Estación Biológica Mosiro-Itajura (Caparú), 60m , 1°04’N , 69°03’W , malaise trap, 11 February 2003 , J. Pinzón leg., 3 spec. , (IAvH-E-149394; IAvH-E-149396; IAvH-E-149399). Vaupés , Centro Ambiental, Estación Biológica Mosiro-Itajura (Caparú), 60m , 1°04’S , 69°31’W , malaise trap, 18 March 2003 , L. Benavides leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149398). Same data, 20 January 2003 , M. Sharkey D. Arias leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149397). Same data, 27 March 2003 , J. Pinzón leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149395).

D. horni ( Benson and Conde, 1938 )
: Bolivia, French Guiana? (Smith 1990) COLOMBIA .
Risaralda
, Urapanera, SFF Otún Quimbaya , 1960m , 4°44’N , 75°35’W , malaise trap, 23 July 2003 , G. López leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E- 151284 ).
